about_the_game:
"I won't stop until the world is destroyed..."

■Experience the tale of Vincent, who lives as a mechanic in the last city on earth. Humanity is experiencing its final days and the planet is dying due to the crystal rain, an ecological disaster that converts people into godlike monsters.

■A story set in pain and lost
Vincent is forced on his journey after seeing the death of a loved one by the hands of a godlike being. Determined to fight for revenge, they set forth on a epic tale to restore what was taken from them and learn about the calamity that ravaged the world. What will become of humanity's future will be determined by the actions you take.


■Explore the world left behind by humans:
The world is filled with both natural and unnatural environments that showcase a host of unique challenges to players. Climb over huge mountains ranges, traverse huge forests or find your way through unwelcoming deserts! Proto-gods and Proto-telos roam the world and will hunt Vincent whenever there is a opportunity. Items and treasure scatter the world that will help you survive this unholy wasteland.




The power of a telos:
Blessed with the power of a demigod, you have been given the power to revive the world in your image. Vincent can use the daemon weapons and control the lost art of magic. String together powerful combos featuring swordplay, guns and magic!

■Choose among the forbidden Daemon Weapons and fight
These are powerful relics that contain the souls of other proto-telos. They hold unbelievable amounts of power and can offer their assistance to Vincent alongside his Journey. However, they don't usually offer their powers for free and may require Vincent to help with their own personal quests before they will join the party.

■Daemon Weapon play styles
Wield up to 10 different daemon weapon types that offer unique play styles, from up-close combat and long range magic. Use a flurry of fast hits hit with the devastating Fallen blade; Vaporize monsters using the stylish Divine Execution Blade; become a deadly antibody hacker with the digital Blades; send powerful charges towards your enemies with the punishing Lance of Longinus; or take aim from a distance with the Mechanic Bow and pistol. These are just a few of the weapon types available in the game, meaning you’re sure to find the play style that suits you best.


■Fight for the Future:
Vincent, as a telos, must become God before other proto-telos can achieve such powers. With the use of his companions and the daemon weapons, face all of your foes with deadly precision.

How you choose the rebuild the world can range from forming a peaceful utopia or a hellish nightmare. What path will you choose in the quest of godhood!

content_descriptors.notes: Cloud: Telos contains adult scenes and themes, such as strong language in certain areas of the game, including blood, violence, criminal acts and sexual acts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit / Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500（3.3GHz and above）/ AMD FX™-6100 （3.3GHz and above）
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon™ R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit / Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770（3.4GHz and above）/ AMD FX™-8350（4.0 GHz and above）
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM / Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card

short_description: A young man is among the chosen few to replace God. However, in order to save the world from falling into oblivion, he must overpower those who strive for the title of godhood themselves! Experience the tale of the new gospel along with a host of eccentric characters and decide the future!
